author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
I tried to create a release but ran into this error:
```
App is installed for user but the repository is not enabled
```
To retry, comment on this PR with the phrase `TagBot tag`.
cc: @christopher-dG
<!-- f6f4aff0-b91a-11e9-9d94-849447c44e96 -->

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/evetion/LazIO.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- f12922c0-b9a8-11e9-89a2-e6fbf70ecac6 -->
